word_mean: 循环：在有规律的或环行的路线中运动，如血液经心脏和血管的运动
流体速度与弧微分矢量的内积，沿一有向简单封闭曲线的线积分。

sentence.Network_en: Massage is used to relax muscles, relieve stress and improve the circulation.
sentence.Network_cn: 按摩可以使肌肉放松，缓解压力和促进血液循环。

sentence.Network_en: The supply of money in circulation was drastically reduced overnight.
sentence.Network_cn: 流通领域的货币供应量一夜骤减。

sentence.Network_en: Circulation is much more sluggish in the feet than in the hands.
sentence.Network_cn: 脚部的循环比手部的循环缓慢得多。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 3.维持循环(Circulation) ①促进并维持血液循环；②胸外按摩；③使用药物。以下几节将介绍复苏的详细步骤及一些具体方法。。

jx.jx_en_mean: available (or unavailable) to the public; in (or not in) general use

lj.lj_ly: there is a huge volume of video material in circulation.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (denoting continuous distillation of a liquid): from Latin circulatio(n-), from the verb circulare (see circulate)

entry.def: The circulation of a newspaper or magazine is the number of copies that are sold each time it is produced.

example.ex: The Daily News once had the highest circulation of any daily in the country...
example.tran: 《每日新闻报》的发行量曾位居全国所有日报之首。

example.ex: The paper has proved unable to maintain its circulation figures.
example.tran: 事实证明这家报纸难以维持其发行量。

entry.def: Your circulation is the movement of blood through your body.

example.ex: Anyone with heart, lung or circulation problems should seek medical advice before flying.
example.tran: 有心肺疾病或血液循环问题的人在乘坐飞机前应寻求医生建议。

example.ex: ...cold spots in the fingers caused by poor circulation.
example.tran: 血液循环不畅导致的手指上的冻疮

entry.tran: (货币等)流通/不流通/退出流通
entry.def: If something such as money is in circulation, it is being used by the public. If something is out of circulation or has been withdrawn from circulation, it is no longer available for use by the public.

example.ex: The supply of money in circulation was drastically reduced overnight.
example.tran: 流通领域的货币供应量一夜骤减。

example.ex: ...a society like America, with perhaps 180 million guns in circulation.
example.tran: 像美国这样一个约有1.8亿支枪流散在外的社会

entry.tran: (一段时间)不出现在公共场合，不参加社交活动;坐牢;服刑
entry.def: If someone is out of circulation, they do not appear in public or at social gatherings for a period of time. You can also say that someone is out of circulation when they are in prison.

example.ex: Political trials were being used to keep prominent activists out of circulation...
example.tran: 通过对著名活动家进行政治审判使其从公众视线中消失。

example.ex: I had been out of circulation for a month and knew that many friends would be there.
example.tran: 我有一个月深居简出，不过我知道许多朋友正等着我。

means.word_mean: 1. the dissemination of copies of periodicals (as newspapers or magazines)
2. movement through a circuit; especially the movement of blood through the heart and blood vessels
3. (library science) the count of books that are loaned by a library over a specified period
4. number of copies of a newspaper or magazine that are sold;

sentences.sentence: "by increasing its circulation the newspaper hoped to increase its advertising"

means.word_mean: 5. free movement or passage through a series of vessels (as of water through pipes or sap through a plant)
6. the spread or transmission of something (as news or money) to a wider group or area

auth_sentence.content: I slapped my arms to keep the circulation going.
auth_sentence.res_content: I slapped my arms to keep the circulation going.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I slapped my arms to keep the circulation going.

auth_sentence.content: The New Zealand Herald newspaper has the biggest circulation.
auth_sentence.res_content: The New Zealand Herald newspaper has the biggest circulation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The New Zealand Herald newspaper has the biggest circulation.

auth_sentence.content: The heat gets distributed around Venus through atmospheric circulation.
auth_sentence.res_content: The heat gets distributed around Venus through atmospheric circulation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The heat gets distributed around Venus through atmospheric circulation.

stems_affixes.word_buile: circuit[n.环行;电路]+ous……的→adj.迂回的,绕圈子的
circ圆,环+ular表形容词→adj.圆的;循环的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 圆周, 圆形物, 派系, 循环
stems_affixes.word_buile: circ圆,环+le→圆周, 圆形物→围, 环绕
circulate[v.循环,流通]+ion动作或状态→n.循环,流通,发行额
circ圆,环+us表名词→[巡回演出的]马戏团
circ圆,环+le→圆周, 圆形物→围, 环绕
circ圆,环+ulate=ate表动词→绕圈走→循环

sentences.en: His father has a bad circulation.
The ideas have been in circulation for some time.
sentences.cn: 这些想法已经流行了一段时间。

sentences.en: This magazine has a large circulation.

jushi.english: A number of forged banknotes are in circulation.
jushi.chinese: 市面上有一定数量的伪钞在流通。

jushi.english: His father has a bad circulation.
The ideas have been in circulation for some time.
jushi.chinese: 这些想法已经流行了一段时间。
